perturbation.original_text:
Fee Due Dates

$75,000 - Sponsorship Fee $50,000 due upon receipt of this term sheet   $25,000 final balance payment due upon announcement date of July 15, 2015.
perturbation.changed_text:
Fee Due Dates

$75,000 - Sponsorship Fee $50,000 due upon receipt of this term sheet   $25,000 final balance payment due upon announcement date of August 1, 2015.
perturbation.explanation: The original agreement states the final payment is due on July 15, 2015. This has been modified to August 1, 2015, creating a contradiction in payment deadlines. This creates uncertainty as to when the final payment is actually due, leading to potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: (xxiii) ANTHEMIC and/ or FLOOD Magazine agree to introduce key VNUE personnel/ staff to key VIRGIN HOTEL CHICAGO personnel/ staff, upon receipt of final payment, on or before July 15, 2015.
perturbation.changed_text: (xxiii) ANTHEMIC and/ or FLOOD Magazine agree to introduce key VNUE personnel/ staff to key VIRGIN HOTEL CHICAGO personnel/ staff, upon receipt of initial payment, on or before July 15, 2015.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause specifies that introductions between personnel will occur upon receipt of *final* payment. Changing this to *initial* payment contradicts the established payment schedule and the intent of ensuring the full payment is received before providing certain benefits. This introduces uncertainty about when these introductions are supposed to take place.

perturbation.original_text: Before April 1, 2016 ANTHEMIC will not discuss in any manner with any person or entity (other than the Sponsor) to be a sponsor of the Event in the Video App category. If ANTHEMIC produces the Event in 2016 and seeks a sponsor in the category, ANTHEMIC will first contact the Sponsor and provide the Sponsor with written notice (the "Notice) of the terms under which the Sponsor can be the category sponsor for the 2016 Event. The Sponsor will have 15 days from receipt of the Notice to accept the terms to be the category sponsor of the 2014 Event.
perturbation.changed_text: Before April 1, 2016 ANTHEMIC will not discuss in any manner with any person or entity (other than the Sponsor) to be a sponsor of the Event in the Video App category. If ANTHEMIC produces the Event in 2016 and seeks a sponsor in the category, ANTHEMIC may immediately engage with other potential sponsors without notifying the Sponsor. The Sponsor will have 15 days from receipt of the Notice to accept the terms to be the category sponsor of the 2016 Event.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause states that ANTHEMIC will first contact the Sponsor and provide the Sponsor with written notice if it seeks a sponsor in the category. Changing this to 'ANTHEMIC may immediately engage with other potential sponsors without notifying the Sponsor' directly contradicts this agreement, creating uncertainty in the sponsorship rights.
